name: nodejs_db_hackernoon
description: This study is a product of of this [tutorial](https://hackernoon.com/setting-up-node-js-with-a-database-part-1-3f2461bdd77f) by *hackernoon* for using `MySQL` from inside a `node.js` app, with small changes:   - `MariaDB` implementation for `MySQL` is used; and   - `LibreOffice` is used to view the database.
